value.title: Tesla releases new Full Self-Driving Beta software update (10.10) to remove ‘rolling stop’, address some corner cases and more
value.excerpt: Tesla has started to releases a new Full Self-Driving Beta software update (10.10) that includes several changes including removing ‘rolling stop’, addressing some corner cases, and more. Tesla Full Self-Driving Beta Since October 2020,

value.title: FOCUS-Self-driving car companies zoom ahead, leaving U.S. regulators behind
value.excerpt: Self-driving vehicle companies from Tesla Inc to General Motors Co's Cruise are racing to start making money with their technology, outrunning efforts by regulators and Congress to write rules of the road for robot-driven vehicles.

value.title: Tesla to recall nearly 54K cars which could threaten future of Full Self Driving feature
value.excerpt: Tesla will have to recall close to 54,000 of its electric vehicles due to a feature called Rolling Stop which comes with the Full Self Driving premium package. The FSD is still in the Beta version.

value.title: Elon Musk: I would be shocked if Tesla does not achieve Full Self-Driving safer than human this year (and 5 years ahead of everyone)
value.excerpt: Elon Musk gave an update on his expected timeline for Tesla achieving Full Self-Driving capability and he now says that he would be “shocked” if Tesla does not achieve “Full Self-Driving safer than human this year”.

value.title: The Grain Of Truth In The Critique Of Musk, Tesla And Full Self Driving (FSD)
value.excerpt: The internet erupted last week following the publication of a full-page ad in the New York Times asserting “Don’t be a Tesla Crash Test Dummy” and impugned “Elon Musk’s ill-advised Full Self-Driving robot car experiment.

value.title: Waymo Sues California DMV Over Robotaxi Safety Data
value.excerpt: The driverless car company — which is owned by Google parent Alphabet Inc. — operates an autonomous taxi fleet in San Francisco, and the question in the suit is whether public safety-related data can be a trade secret.

value.title: Waymo sues state DMV to keep robotaxi safety details secret
value.excerpt: A court may decide whether Waymo's business interests outweigh the public's right to understand the safety issues around self-driving cars

value.title: Humanoid robot is Tesla's 'most important product' this year, Musk says
value.excerpt: Tesla CEO Elon Musk has his eyes set on more than just building electric cars. In the company's fourth-quarter earnings call on Wednesday, Musk said Tesla's "most important product" it would be developing this year did not have wheels,

value.title: Self-driving Teslas will cause 'insane' traffic, Elon Musk says
value.excerpt: Tesla CEO Elon Musk said the autonomous ride hailing service he envisions customers will put their autonomous Teslas to work in will cause "insane" traffic.

value.title: Tesla News: Automaker Prioritizes New Humanoid Robot Over Vehicle Models In 2022
value.excerpt: Tesla is prioritizing the development of a humanoid robot over its vehicles in 2022 and it will be designed to perform dangerous, repetitive, or physical tasks only humans can complete.

value.title: Will Tesla's Dojo Supercomputer Disrupt AI in 2022?

value.title: Elon Musk: Tesla is prioritizing product development of Optimus humanoid robot in 2022
value.excerpt: Elon Musk announced that Tesla is going to be shifting its product development to make Tesla Bot, a humanoid robot also known as Optimus, a priority in 2022. This is quite a surprising change of strategy.

value.title: Baidu, Geely EV Venture Raises $400 Million of Fresh Funding
value.excerpt: Jidu Auto, a smart electric vehicle joint venture between Baidu and Geely, completed a $400 million funding round backed by the two shareholders, the company said Wednesday. The breakdown of the new investment was not disclosed.

value.title: Technique improves AI's ability to understand 3D space using 2D images
value.excerpt: Researchers have developed a new technique, called MonoCon, that improves the ability of artificial intelligence (AI) programs to identify three-dimensional (3D) objects, and how those objects relate to each other in space,

value.title: Self-driving car users shouldn't be accountable for accidents, report suggests
value.excerpt: Drivers should be reclassified when operating a fully autonomous vehicle and not be held legally accountable for any road accidents, a new report has proposed. Rather, the company behind the driving system should be responsible,

value.title: Baidu's car-making JV raises $400 million
value.excerpt: Jidu, a joint venture between Chinese technology giant Baidu and Chinese carmaker Geely, said Wednesday that it has raised nearly $400 million from its two parents. The joint venture, established in January 2021,

value.title: Baidu’s EV project Jidu secures $400 million in Series A
value.excerpt: Baidu’s electric vehicle (EV) project Jidu Auto announced on Wednesday that it has raised nearly $400 million in Series A as the Chinese search engine giant accelerates the development of EVs with self-driving capabilities.

value.title: Volkswagen, Bosch team up on self-driving software to test Tesla
value.excerpt: The platform, announced by VW’s Cariad software unit and Bosch on Tuesday, will serve all Volkswagen Group passenger vehicles before being opened to the wider industry. As a first step, the partners plan to roll out technology from next year that will allow drivers to temporarily take their hands off the steering wheel via an over-the-air update.

value.title: Mercedes sees Luminar eyes in its self-driving cars
value.excerpt: Mercedes-Benz has taken a major step forward in its efforts to produce self-driving cars, partnering with Luminar to include the latter’s Iris lidar technology in Mercedes-Benz vehicles. The

value.title: Machine Learning And Artificial Intelligence: Implementation In Practice
value.excerpt: When it comes to AI, more and more companies are facing a choice: whether to develop a project using a traditional approach (predefined rules) or with the implementation of ML (teaching machines to do something not by instruction or logic but by examples or some kind of feedback).

value.title: Robotics Startups Seek to Build a Better Self-Driving Lawn Mower
value.excerpt: Tiger Global led an investment in Electric Sheep Robotics, which makes a device for large-scale, autonomous commercial mowers.

value.title: Boeing to pour $450 million into program for self-driving air taxi
value.excerpt: Aviation company Boeing said Monday that it's investing almost a half-billion more dollars into its sky taxi startup Wisk Aero, in a bid to bring the first self-flying air taxi to the market before the decade is out.

value.title: LG to showcase self driving vehicle next month
value.excerpt: The LG Omnipod, a mobility concept solution that can serve as "a home office, an entertainment center or even a lounge," will be on display at a mobility fair at the COEX convention center in southern Seoul on Feb.

value.title: How Will Self-Driving Cars Affect Cities Like Chicago?
value.excerpt: Self-driving cars are spreading out across the country, and you may see one yourself on the Kennedy or Dan Ryan Expressway soon. CBS News’ Laura Podesta has a report, and DePaul University Professor Joe Schwieterman talks with CBS 2’s Jim Williams and Marie Saavedra about how self-driving cars will affect big cities like Chicago.

value.title: New Ratings Aim To Make Partial ‘Self Driving’ Safer
value.excerpt: Many partially automated systems that “share” the driving with motorists, like Autopilot, Pilot Assist and Super Cruise, don't provide enough back-up protections, according to a new ratings system.

value.title: Mercedes-Benz teams up with Luminar on self-driving tech
value.excerpt: Luxury carmaker Mercedes-Benz will partner with self-driving sensor maker Luminar Technologies Inc to enable fully automated driving on highways for its next-generation vehicles, Luminar's founder said.
